author: Tara Law
title: ‘It’s Like a Lifeline.’ How Religious Leaders Are Helping People Stay Connected in a Time of Isolation
description: Services and informal groups are moving online amid the COVID-19 outbreak, while others are organizing help for elderly congregants.
content: The coronavirus didn’t scare the senior group at Fremont Presbyterian Church in Sacramento, Calif. For World War II veterans and survivors of the Great Depression, the outbreak seemed like a comparatively meek threat. But Bobbi Trask, minister of member care,… [+5487 chars]
